definitions.definition: Alert , awake ; with one's mental faculties active.
examples: The noise woke me, but it was another few minutes before I was fully conscious .

definitions.definition: Aware of one's own existence; aware of one's own awareness .
examples: Only highly intelligent beings can be fully conscious .

definitions.definition: Aware of, sensitive to; observing and noticing, or being strongly interested in or concerned about.
examples: I was conscious of a noise behind me.   a very class- conscious analysis

definitions.definition: Deliberate , intentional , done with awareness of what one is doing.
Known or felt personally, internally by a person.
Self-conscious , or aware of wrongdoing, feeling guilty.

main_definition: Alert , awake ; with one's mental faculties active.
secondary_definitions: Aware of one's own existence; aware of one's own awareness .
Aware of, sensitive to; observing and noticing, or being strongly interested in or concerned about.
Deliberate , intentional , done with awareness of what one is doing.
Known or felt personally, internally by a person.
( rare ) Self-conscious , or aware of wrongdoing, feeling guilty.
